attributes.action: London air pollution(congestion) charge to ALL vehicles no exempts.
attributes.additional_details: Existing congestion/pollution charge doesn't help - too many exemptions for taxis, buses and other vehicles. A bold action is required within reasonable means. Clean electric cars are not too expensive for general public and even black cabs. Since this is for London only, polluting cars can be sold for use outside London without too much loss. http://www.standard.co.uk/comment/comment/rosamund-urwin-there-s-no-excuse-for-apathy-over-london-s-filthy-air-a3161816.html
attributes.background:
1. Due to high London air pollution, please consider immediately doubling congestion charge for ALL(inc. taxis, freight, etc) CO2 or other poisonous particles emitting vehicles, from £11.5/day to £23/day.
2. Again double congestion charge in 12months to £46/day. In 24 months to £92/day.
3. Breath!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the London Assembly. 

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: 

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
